sizeConfiguration.Description: Represents the size configuration under the lab account

enabledRegionSelection.Description: Represents if region selection is enabled

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning status of the resource.

uniqueIdentifier.Description: The unique immutable identifier of a resource (Guid).

latestOperationResult.Description: Details of the status of an operation.

environmentSizes.Description: Represents a list of size categories supported by this Lab Account (Small, Medium, Large)

name.Description: The size category. Possible values include: 'Basic', 'Standard', 'Performance'

vmSizes.Description: Represents a set of compute sizes that can serve this given size type

maxPrice.Description: The pay-as-you-go dollar price per hour this size will cost. It does not include discounts and may not reflect the actual price the size will cost. This is the maximum price of all prices within this tier.

minNumberOfCores.Description: The number of cores a VM of this size has. This is the minimum number of cores within this tier.

minMemory.Description: The amount of memory available (in GB). This is the minimum amount of memory within this tier.

computeSize.Description: Represents the actual compute size, e.g. Standard_A2_v2.

price.Description: The pay-as-you-go price per hour this size will cost. It does not include discounts and may not reflect the actual price the size will cost.

numberOfCores.Description: The number of cores a VM of this size has.

memory.Description: The amount of memory available (in GB).

status.Description: The current status of the operation.

httpMethod.Description: The HttpMethod - PUT/POST/DELETE for the operation.

operationUrl.Description: The URL to use to check long-running operation status

author.Description: The author of the gallery image.

createdDate.Description: The creation date of the gallery image.

description.Description: The description of the gallery image.

imageReference.Description: The reference information for an Azure Marketplace image.

icon.Description: The icon of the gallery image.

isEnabled.Description: Indicates whether this gallery image is enabled.

isOverride.Description: Indicates whether this gallery has been overridden for this lab account

planId.Description: The third party plan that applies to this image

isPlanAuthorized.Description: Indicates if the plan has been authorized for programmatic deployment.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning status of the resource.

uniqueIdentifier.Description: The unique immutable identifier of a resource (Guid).

latestOperationResult.Description: Details of the status of an operation.

offer.Description: The offer of the gallery image.

publisher.Description: The publisher of the gallery image.

sku.Description: The SKU of the gallery image.

osType.Description: The OS type of the gallery image.

version.Description: The version of the gallery image.

maxUsersInLab.Description: Maximum number of users allowed in the lab.

userQuota.Description: Maximum value MaxUsersInLab can be set to, as specified by the service

invitationCode.Description: Invitation code that users can use to join a lab.

createdByObjectId.Description: Object id of the user that created the lab.

usageQuota.Description: Maximum duration a user can use an environment for in the lab.

userAccessMode.Description: Lab user access mode (open to all vs. restricted to those listed on the lab). Possible values include: 'Restricted', 'Open'

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning status of the resource.

uniqueIdentifier.Description: The unique immutable identifier of a resource (Guid).

latestOperationResult.Description: Details of the status of an operation.

publishingState.Description: Describes the readiness of this environment setting. Possible values include: 'Draft', 'Publishing', 'Published', 'PublishFailed', 'Scaling'

configurationState.Description: Describes the user's progress in configuring their environment setting. Possible values include: 'NotApplicable', 'Completed'

description.Description: Describes the environment and its resource settings

title.Description: Brief title describing the environment and its resource settings

lastChanged.Description: Time when the template VM was last changed.

lastPublished.Description: Time when the template VM was last sent for publishing.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning status of the resource.

uniqueIdentifier.Description: The unique immutable identifier of a resource (Guid).

latestOperationResult.Description: Details of the status of an operation.

id.Description: The unique id of the resource setting

galleryImageResourceId.Description: The resource id of the gallery image used for creating the virtual machine

imageName.Description: The name of the image used to created the environment setting

size.Description: The size of the virtual machine. Possible values include: 'Basic', 'Standard', 'Performance'

cores.Description: The translated compute cores of the virtual machine

userName.Description: The username of the virtual machine

password.Description: The password of the virtual machine. This will be set to null in GET resource API

vmStateDetails.Description: Details about the state of the reference virtual machine.

vmResourceId.Description: VM resource Id for the environment

rdpAuthority.Description: The RdpAuthority property is a server DNS host name or IP address followed by the service port number for RDP (Remote Desktop Protocol).

sshAuthority.Description: The SshAuthority property is a server DNS host name or IP address followed by the service port number for SSH.

powerState.Description: The power state of the reference virtual machine.

lastKnownPowerState.Description: Last known compute power state captured in DTL

resourceSets.Description: Represents a VM and the setting Id it was created for.

claimedByUserObjectId.Description: The AAD object Id of the user who has claimed the environment

claimedByUserPrincipalId.Description: The user principal Id of the user who has claimed the environment

claimedByUserName.Description: The name or email address of the user who has claimed the environment

isClaimed.Description: Is the environment claimed or not

lastKnownPowerState.Description: Last known power state of the environment

totalUsage.Description: How long the environment has been used by a lab user

passwordLastReset.Description: When the password was last reset on the environment.

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning status of the resource.

uniqueIdentifier.Description: The unique immutable identifier of a resource (Guid).

latestOperationResult.Description: Details of the status of an operation.

vmResourceId.Description: VM resource Id for the environment

privateIpAddress.Description: PrivateIp address of the Compute VM

email.Description: The user email address, as it was specified during registration.

familyName.Description: The user family name, as it was specified during registration.

givenName.Description: The user given name, as it was specified during registration.

tenantId.Description: The user tenant ID, as it was specified during registration.

totalUsage.Description: How long the user has used his VMs in this lab

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning status of the resource.

uniqueIdentifier.Description: The unique immutable identifier of a resource (Guid).

latestOperationResult.Description: Details of the status of an operation.
